content.thinking:
All HTML files currently have:
```html
<link rel="icon" href="/favicon.ico" sizes="32x32">
<link rel="apple-touch-icon" href="/apple-touch-icon.png">
```

They need to be replaced with:
```html
<link rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="180x180" href="/apple-touch-icon.png">
<link rel="icon" type="image/png" sizes="32x32" href="/favicon-32x32.png">
<link rel="icon" type="image/png" sizes="16x16" href="/favicon-16x16.png">


<link rel="manifest" href="/site.webmanifest">
```

I should check one file to see the exact context around those lines, then do a bulk replace across all files. I also need to update the webmanifest file itself with the proper metadata like name, short_name, theme_color, and background_color.

The Operating Manual You Were Never Given

A 40+ page psychological portrait based on the exact position of 20 celestial bodies at the moment of your birth. Not fortune-telling — personality decoding.

See What's Inside Order Now
Astrolog 7.80 & Swiss Ephemeris · 20 celestial bodies · 50+ aspects per chart · Written & checked by hand · 50+ aspects per chart · 3 native languages
Sun: Virgo Moon: Scorpio Ascendant: Libra

The Libra Ascendant: the first impression is grace, harmony, and aesthetic perfection. Everything is curated — the image, the movement, the presentation. Libra rising people are acutely aware of how they're perceived and use that awareness as a creative tool.

The Virgo Sun beneath the glamour reveals a relentless perfectionist. Virgo is the sign of craft, detail, and the 10,000-hour rule. The Scorpio Moon adds emotional depth and intensity — a volcanic inner world controlled on the surface, molten underneath.

Read Beyoncé's Full Report

What We Analyze in Your Birth Chart

20 Celestial Bodies

10 planets (Sun through Pluto), Chiron, Ceres, Pallas, Juno, Vesta, North Node, South Node, Black Moon Lilith, Vertex, Part of Fortune.

9 Aspect Types

Conjunction, Sextile, Square, Trine, Opposition, Semi-Square, Sesquiquadrate, Quincunx, Semi-Sextile — each with exact orb.

12 Placidus Houses

Full house system with rulers. Not simplified equal houses.

Aspect Patterns

T-Squares, Grand Trines, Yods, Grand Crosses, Stelliums — detected and interpreted.

Element & Modality Balance

Fire signs, earth signs, air signs, water signs — your elemental distribution. Cardinal, Fixed, Mutable ratios.

Retrograde Analysis

Every retrograde planet identified and interpreted in context.

Your chart contains 50+ planetary aspects. We interpret every single one.

Understand your child through their natal chart. Emotional needs, learning style, natural talents, and the challenges they'll face.

Get Your Parenting Guide

How It Works

  1. Fill in birth details

    Name, date, exact time, and city of birth.

  2. We compute your full chart

    Astrolog 7.80 calculates exact positions for 20 celestial bodies, maps 50+ aspect configurations with precise orbs, and plots all 12 Placidus houses. We then extract your chart’s unique signature — the specific pattern of planetary weights, elemental balance, and aspect geometry that belongs only to you.

  3. We write your report by hand

    Your chart data goes through 13 analysis modules built on the interpretive frameworks of Liz Greene, Robert Hand, and Steven Forrest. Each section is written individually for your placements — cross-referencing aspects, house rulers, and dispositorship chains. No templates. No recycled paragraphs.

  4. Written, checked & delivered

    Every report is proofread and checked for coherence, accuracy, and depth before it reaches you. PDF delivered to your email within 24 hours.

Why ZodiacID

What People Say

— J.L., Tallinn

Get astrology insights in your inbox

Chart pattern analysis, celebrity breakdowns, and behind-the-scenes from ZodiacID.

Free. Unsubscribe anytime. No spam.

Frequently Asked Questions

What exactly do I get?

A 40+ page PDF natal chart report covering 12 life areas — personality traits, love patterns, career strengths, and more. Includes your natal wheel chart. Delivered directly to your email.

How are the reports created?

We manually process your birth data through a multi-stage pipeline. First, Astrolog 7.80 (Swiss Ephemeris) computes exact positions for 20 celestial bodies and maps 50+ aspect configurations with precise orbs. We then extract your chart’s unique statistical signature — planetary weights, elemental distribution, aspect geometry, and dispositorship chains. Each of the 13 report sections is then written individually for your placements, using the interpretive frameworks of Liz Greene (psychological astrology), Robert Hand (systematic aspect analysis), and Steven Forrest (evolutionary astrology). Every report is written, proofread, and checked by hand before delivery.

What makes ZodiacID different?

Every report is written and proofread by hand. 20 celestial bodies, 50+ aspects with exact orbs, dispositorship chains, and house ruler cross-references. 40+ pages of original birth chart interpretation — no templates, no recycled paragraphs. Available natively in 3 languages.

Are these reports scientifically proven?

No. Astrology is not a science. We don’t predict the future — we offer a framework for self-exploration based on your birth chart.

What if I don't know my exact birth time?

Check your birth certificate or ask a family member. An approximate time usually works, though exact time gives the most detailed results.

How long until I receive my report?

Within 24 hours. Every report is written and proofread by hand before delivery.

Can I get a refund?

Yes. Full refund within 14 days, no questions asked.

What languages are available?

English, Russian, and Estonian — written natively, not translated.
